name: Rosemary Garlic Kohlrabi & Carrot Fries

ingredients.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning or SPG Seasoning

preparation: Cut carrots and kohlrabi in half, widthwise, and then cut into sticks.
Place in a bowl with seasoning and oil, tossing to coat.
Arrange in a single layer on a crisper. Bake for 25–35 minutes, until lightly crispy but cooked.
tips: Serve your veggie fries standing upright in a teacup or small stoneware bowl, accompanied by your favourite Epicure dip!
Experiment with other firm root vegetables, like sweet potatoes, parsnips, and yams. Cooking time may vary.
